td.content: s:a white male fisherman aged 53 years complains of recurrent severe chest pressure over the past month. The pt reports intermittent vision loss in one eye. Patient reports that he never drinks alcohol smokes 1 pack/day o:Height 191 cm, Weight 64.6 kg, Temperature 36.8 C, Pulse 75, SystolicBP 107, DiastolicBP 67, Respiration 14, Lipid Panel total cholestrol=249 mg/dL,HDL=41 mg/dL,LDL=140 mg/dL, Basic Metabolic Panel Na=135 meq/L,K=4 meq/L, ECG ST elevation in leads 11, 111, and aVF, Chest X-Ray normal, eye = cholesterol plaques seen a:High Blood Cholesterol p:administered gemfibrozil - 1200 mg /day in 2 divided doses, performed Lipid Panel, Basic Metabolic Panel, ECG, Chest X-Ray, and performed E/M Emergency Services Level 3 - Completed.
